mapper.insert: insert all into member values (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{username}, #{email1}, #{email2}, #{phone}, sysdate) into address (userid, post_num, addr1, addr2, address_id) values (#{userid}, #{post_num}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, address_address_id_seq.nextval) into profile values (#{userid}, 'user.png', ' ') select * from dual
